contentfulProduct.seoTitle: Organic Turkish Cotton Baby Hooded Towel Set
contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Woven of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our super soft and plush baby hooded towel set will keep your little one warm and cozy after bath time. Set includes two hooded towels.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Turkish Cotton Baby Hooded Towel Set

content.value: Woven of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our super soft and plush baby hooded towel set will keep your little one warm and cozy after bath time. Set includes two hooded towels.
Set includes two hooded towels
Made of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton
360 gsm
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Made with care in Turkey

Machine wash cool with like colors using mild laundry detergent. Avoid washing with items that have zippers, Velcro, hooks, or other sharp objects that could snag or pull the loops. In the event of a snagged loop, cut it with scissors. Avoid contact with skin care products to prevent discoloration. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.
